divs: sighting detailsdriving west on fruitridge rd and turning left onto freeport blvd going south. i noticed a bright white round object right at about eye level 3- o clock. way in the distance thinking is that the moon? or venus? 1\4 mile or less down freeport blvd is the slightest rise at 35th ave is a 3 way stop light. waiting on red light no cars in front of me. object now at 2- o clock dime size with a round pencil size eraser bright white light with in the round circle. heat waves all around the eraser size circle. but not outside the dime or covering the circle. like everything was in a bubble. driving 1\4 mile to next 3 way stop light at 43rd ave. stopped at light now looking up at 12 o clock. bending way near the steering wheel to look up at the object. object was blurry changing from bright white to orange. object seemed about 40' or 50' in the air. i looked away to see if the light changed and it was gone. what i was thinking. what i'm think now! 1) object didn't seem like it moved. clear day no clouds. 2) object was a reflection. yes probably so! i have a cracked wind- shield right under rear view mirror running from passenger side up to the mirror. sun was about 3 oclock to the west. 3) object was a plane? yes maybe. freeport blvd runs parallel executive airport right where i was driving at! should have called traffic controllers. they were eye level. dummy 4) i moved my head around while looking at the object and it always stayed in the same spot? never lost sight of it. nothing reflective on dash. but probably reflection\plane?
Summary: Round object size of a dime. Bright round light in the center with what looked like heat waves inclosed with in the dime sized object.
